description: Rochelle tells his friends that the spark is going out of his relationship with Gonzales. Carlos Morales and boyfriend Christophe Blanc argue about monogamy, but Michael Lucas invites Rochelle to bring Gonzales to an orgy. Morales and Blanc prove that longtime lovers can have great sex, as Morales opens his luscious, insatiable ass to Blanc and a dildo at the same time.
title: Carlos Morales and Christophe Blanc
